mapper.select: SELECT P.NO , P.SCORE , P.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(P.POINT_DATE, 'YY.MM.DD HH24:MI') AS POINT_DATE , M.NO AS MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.PROFILE AS MEMBER_PROFILE , A.NO AS ADMIN_NO , A.NAME AS ADMIN_NAME FROM POINT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN ADMIN A ON P.ADMIN_NO = A.NO

SELECT P.NO , P.SCORE , P.CONTENT , M.NO AS MEMBER_NO , M.NAME AS MEMBER_NAME , M.PROFILE AS MEMBER_PROFILE FROM POINT P JOIN MEMBER M ON P.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN ADMIN A ON P.ADMIN_NO = A.NO WHERE P.NO = #{pno}
